summary: This Non-Disclosure Agreement (NDA), signed July 7, 2025, between Innovate Systems Ltd. and Rohan Mehra, protects Innovate Systems' confidential data.  Mehra, as a Data Analyst, is obligated to maintain the confidentiality of this information, using it only for work-related purposes and returning it upon termination.  The agreement's confidentiality clauses survive the employment relationship for one year.  Breach of confidentiality results in immediate termination and potential penalties for Mehra.  Haryana, India law governs the agreement.
